subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Though the number of fights in the N.H.L. has dropped in recent years, fighting persists, preserved by the idea that it is a deterrent against cheap shots and is something fans enjoy.
snippet: Though the number of fights in the N.H.L. has dropped in recent years, fighting persists, preserved by the idea that it is a deterrent against cheap shots and is something fans enjoy.
